title: Present Perfect Or Present Perfect Continuous

questions.question: I …………………………… to solve this problem for a while.
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: The postman has ......................................
questions.description: Been is used to indicate completed visits.

questions.question: I couldn’t meet him. He had ……………………………. to Ireland.
questions.description: Has gone is used to talk about incomplete visits.

questions.question: He …………………………………… in this office for 15 years.
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that started in the past and has continued up to the present. The present perfect can also be used with this meaning.

questions.question: 'You look tired.' 'Yes, I ..................................... for hours.'
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: I ……………………………… my dinner.
questions.description: The present perfect is commonly used to talk about recently finished actions and situations.

questions.question: I …………………………….. that movie six times.
questions.description: The present perfect is used with the meaning up to now.

questions.question: I ...................................... cleaning the kitchen.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about recently finished actions or situations.

questions.question: She ……………………………… to him for 18 years.
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: Have you ever ................................... a ghost?
questions.description: The present perfect is often used to talk about life experiences.

questions.question: I .................................. a lot about him but I …………………………. any opportunity to meet him.
